about.title: About ShareHub
about.subtitle: We're building the future of community-driven resource sharing, where neighbors help neighbors while creating more sustainable and connected communities.
about.missionText: To create a world where communities thrive through resource sharing, reducing waste, building connections, and making life more affordable and sustainable for everyone.
about.problemText: Too many resources sit idle while people nearby need them. Traditional ownership models lead to waste, unnecessary expenses, and missed opportunities for community connection.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.communityFirstDesc: We believe in the power of community and building meaningful connections between neighbors.
about.trustSafetyDesc: Creating a secure environment where users can share resources with confidence and peace of mind.
about.innovationDesc: Continuously improving our platform with cutting-edge technology and user-centered design.
about.sustainabilityDesc: Promoting environmental responsibility through resource sharing and waste reduction.
about.learnMoreSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with any questions or feedback.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.noticeText: This Privacy Policy explains how ShareHub ("we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our platform. By using ShareHub, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy.personalInformationDesc: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, phone number, and profile photo. This information helps us verify your identity and facilitate communication between users.
privacy.resourceInformationDesc: When you list resources, we collect descriptions, photos, pricing, and location information to help other users find and book your items.
privacy.usageDataDesc: We automatically collect information about how you use ShareHub, including pages visited, features used, and interaction patterns to improve our service.
privacy.locationDataDesc: With your permission, we collect location data to show nearby resources and facilitate local sharing. You can disable location sharing at any time.
privacy.serviceProvisionDesc: We use your information to provide ShareHub services, including account management, resource listings, booking facilitation, and customer support.
privacy.communicationDesc: We send you important updates about your account, bookings, and platform changes. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time.
privacy.safetySecurityDesc: We use your information to verify identities, prevent fraud, and maintain the safety and security of our platform and community.
privacy.improvementDesc: We analyze usage patterns to improve our platform, develop new features, and enhance user experience.
privacy.withOtherUsersDesc: Your profile information and resource listings are visible to other ShareHub users to facilitate sharing and communication.
privacy.serviceProvidersDesc: We share information with trusted third-party service providers who help us operate ShareHub, such as payment processors and cloud storage providers.
privacy.legalRequirementsDesc: We may disclose information when required by law, to protect our rights, or to ensure user safety and platform security.
privacy.businessTransfersDesc: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, user information may be transferred as part of the business transaction.
privacy.encryptionDesc: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data both in transit and at rest. All sensitive information is encrypted using advanced security protocols.
privacy.accessControlsDesc: We implement strict access controls to ensure only authorized personnel can access user data, and all access is logged and monitored.
privacy.regularAuditsDesc: We conduct regular security audits and assessments to identify and address potential vulnerabilities in our systems.
privacy.incidentResponseDesc: We have comprehensive incident response procedures in place to quickly address any security breaches and notify affected users.
privacy.accessData: Access your personal information and request a copy of your data
privacy.correctData: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information in your account
privacy.deleteData: Delete your account and associated personal information
privacy.restrictProcessing: Restrict or object to certain processing of your information
privacy.dataPortability: Data portability - receive your data in a machine-readable format
privacy.withdrawConsent: Withdraw consent for data processing where consent was given
privacy.contactPrivacyTeam: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@sharehub.com or through our contact form. We will respond to your request within 30 days.
privacy.cookiesTrackingDesc: ShareHub uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and analyze platform usage. We use the following types of cookies:
privacy.essentialCookiesDesc: Required for basic platform functionality, including authentication and security features.
privacy.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help us understand how users interact with ShareHub to improve our services.
privacy.preferenceCookiesDesc: Remember your settings and preferences to provide a personalized experience.
privacy.marketingCookiesDesc: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and measure campaign effectiveness.
privacy.manageCookies: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or by contacting us directly.
privacy.questionsAboutPrivacyDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, we're here to help.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using ShareHub
terms.legalAgreementDesc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of ShareHub and constitute a binding legal agreement between you and ShareHub. Please read them carefully and contact us if you have any questions before using our platform.
terms.acceptanceDesc: By accessing and using ShareHub, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service. These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and ShareHub.
terms.serviceDescriptionText: ShareHub is a peer-to-peer resource sharing platform that connects users who want to share tools, skills, vehicles, spaces, and services with others in their community. We provide the technology platform but do not own, control, or manage any of the resources listed by users.
terms.userAccountsDesc: To use ShareHub, you must create an account and provide accurate, complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
terms.userConductDesc: Users must conduct themselves respectfully and lawfully. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to: posting false or misleading information, engaging in fraudulent activities, harassing other users, violating intellectual property rights, or using the platform for illegal purposes.
terms.provideAccurateDescriptions: Provide accurate descriptions and photos of resources
terms.ensureResourcesSafe: Ensure resources are safe and in working condition
terms.respondPromptly: Respond promptly to booking requests and messages
terms.complyWithLaws: Comply with local laws and regulations
terms.useResourcesResponsibly: Use resources responsibly and as intended
terms.returnInSameCondition: Return resources in the same condition received
terms.payFeesPromptly: Pay all fees promptly and in full
terms.communicateIssues: Communicate any issues or damages immediately
terms.followSafetyGuidelines: Follow all safety guidelines and instructions
terms.respectProperty: Respect the owner's property and time
terms.prohibitedItemsDesc: The following items and activities are strictly prohibited on ShareHub:
terms.intellectualProperty: Items that violate intellectual property rights
terms.unlicensedItems: Items requiring special licenses without proper documentation
terms.serviceFeesDesc: ShareHub charges a service fee for each completed transaction. The fee structure is clearly displayed during the booking process and includes payment processing costs.
terms.paymentProcessingDesc: All payments are processed through secure third-party payment processors. ShareHub does not store payment card information on our servers.
terms.refundsCancellationsDesc: Refund policies vary by resource type and are set by individual resource owners. Cancellation policies are clearly displayed on each listing.
terms.disclaimerText: ShareHub is a platform that connects users but does not own or control the resources being shared. Users participate at their own risk and are responsible for their own insurance coverage and liability protection.
terms.platformLiabilityDesc: ShareHub provides the platform "as is" and disclaims all warranties. We are not liable for damages, injuries, or losses that may occur during resource sharing transactions.
terms.userInsuranceDesc: Users are strongly encouraged to maintain appropriate insurance coverage for their resources and activities. Some resources may require specific insurance verification.
terms.terminationDesc: ShareHub reserves the right to suspend or terminate user accounts for violations of these Terms of Service, including but not limited to fraudulent activity, harassment, or repeated policy violations.
terms.userTermination: Users may terminate their accounts at any time by contacting customer support. Upon termination, access to the platform will be revoked, but certain information may be retained as required by law.
terms.questionsAboutTermsDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please don't hesitate to contact us.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and get the help you need
help.searchPlaceholder: Search for help articles, FAQs, and guides...

gettingStartedArticles.createAccount: How to create your ShareHub account

sharingResourcesArticles.listFirstResource: How to list your first resource

bookingResourcesArticles.searchFind: How to search and find resources

faq1.question: How do I create an account on ShareHub?
faq1.answer: You can create an account by clicking the "Sign Up" button in the top right corner of any page. You can sign up using your email address, Google account, or Apple ID. After signing up, you'll need to verify your email address and complete your profile.

faq2.question: Is ShareHub free to use?
faq2.answer: Creating an account and browsing resources is completely free. ShareHub charges a small service fee only when you complete a booking or rental transaction. The fee covers payment processing and platform maintenance costs.

faq3.question: How do payments work on ShareHub?
faq3.answer: ShareHub uses secure payment processing through trusted third-party providers. You can pay using credit cards, debit cards, or digital wallets. Payments are held securely and released to resource owners after successful completion of the rental period.

faq4.question: What if something goes wrong with my booking?
faq4.answer: If you encounter any issues with your booking, first try to resolve it directly with the other user through our messaging system. If that doesn't work, contact our support team through the help center, and we'll help mediate the situation.

faq5.question: How do I cancel a booking?
faq5.answer: You can cancel a booking through your calendar or by going to the specific booking details. Cancellation policies vary by resource and are set by individual owners. Some bookings may be eligible for full refunds, while others may have cancellation fees.

faq6.question: Is my personal information safe on ShareHub?
faq6.answer: Yes, we take privacy and security very seriously. We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data and never share your personal information with third parties without your consent. Read our Privacy Policy for complete details.

faq7.question: How do I report a problem or inappropriate behavior?
faq7.answer: You can report issues directly through the platform by clicking the "Report" button on any listing or user profile. You can also contact our support team directly. We investigate all reports promptly and take appropriate action.

faq8.question: Can I use ShareHub in my city?
faq8.answer: ShareHub is currently available in 25+ cities and expanding rapidly. Check our website or app to see if ShareHub is available in your area. If not, you can join our waitlist to be notified when we launch in your city.

contact.lookingForQuickAnswersDesc: Check out our comprehensive FAQ section and help center for instant answers to common questions.
contact.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

safety.title: Safety & Trust
safety.subtitle: Your safety is our top priority. Learn about our safety features and best practices for secure sharing.
safety.safetyFeaturesDesc: ShareHub includes multiple layers of protection to keep our community safe
safety.identityVerificationDesc: All users must verify their identity through government-issued ID and phone number verification before participating in the ShareHub community.
safety.profileReviewsDesc: Our community-driven review system helps you make informed decisions by reading feedback from other users about their experiences.
safety.securePaymentsDesc: All transactions are processed through encrypted, secure payment systems. Your financial information is never stored on our servers.
safety.24x7SupportDesc: Our safety team is available around the clock to respond to urgent safety concerns and provide assistance when needed.
safety.safetyBestPracticesDesc: Follow these guidelines to ensure safe and positive experiences

ownerTips.verifyIdentity: Always verify the identity of renters before handing over your resources
ownerTips.takePhotos: Take photos of your items before and after each rental
ownerTips.setExpectations: Set clear expectations about proper use and care of your resources
ownerTips.meetPublic: Meet in public places for initial exchanges when possible
ownerTips.trustInstincts: Trust your instincts - if something feels wrong, don't proceed
ownerTips.keepRecords: Keep records of all communications through the ShareHub platform

renterTips.readCarefully: Read resource descriptions and reviews carefully before booking
renterTips.communicateClearly: Communicate clearly about your intended use of the resource
renterTips.inspectThoroughly: Inspect items thoroughly before accepting them
renterTips.followGuidelines: Follow all safety guidelines and instructions provided by the owner
renterTips.returnSameCondition: Return items in the same condition you received them
renterTips.reportIssues: Report any issues or damages immediately

safety.reportingStepsDesc: If you encounter any safety issues, follow these steps to report them
safety.step1Desc: Take photos, screenshots, or notes about the safety concern or inappropriate behavior.
safety.step2Desc: Use the report button on the user's profile or resource listing, or contact our safety team directly.
safety.step3Desc: Give us as much information as possible about what happened, when, and who was involved.
safety.step4Desc: Our safety team will investigate and follow up with you about the resolution within 24 hours.
safety.prohibitedBehaviorsDesc: The following behaviors are strictly prohibited and may result in account suspension

prohibitedList.discrimination: Discrimination based on race, gender, religion, or other protected characteristics
prohibitedList.falseInfo: Sharing false or misleading information about resources
prohibitedList.outsideTransactions: Attempting to conduct transactions outside the ShareHub platform
prohibitedList.fakeAccounts: Creating fake accounts or impersonating others

safety.emergencyContactsDesc: Know who to contact in different safety situations
safety.immediateDangerDesc: If you are in immediate physical danger, call emergency services first
safety.safetyEmergencyDesc: For urgent safety concerns related to ShareHub transactions
safety.generalSafetyDesc: For non-urgent safety concerns and reporting inappropriate behavior
safety.platformProtectionDesc: ShareHub provides basic protection for certain types of transactions, but users are encouraged to maintain their own insurance coverage for valuable items and activities.
safety.userResponsibilityDesc: Users are responsible for ensuring they have appropriate insurance coverage for their resources and activities. This may include homeowner's insurance, renter's insurance, or specialized coverage for high-value items.
safety.damageResolutionDesc: In case of damage or disputes, ShareHub provides mediation services to help users reach fair resolutions. Our support team works with both parties to find mutually acceptable solutions.
safety.questionsAboutSafetyDesc: Our safety team is here to help. Contact us with any questions or concerns about staying safe on ShareHub.
